block.l: return listify(JSON.parse(jsonString)); function listify(jsonObject) { if (jsonObject instanceof Array) { return new List(jsonObject.map(function(eachElement) { return listify(eachElement)})); } else if (jsonObject instanceof Object) { return new List(Object.keys(jsonObject).map(function(eachKey) { return new List([eachKey,listify(jsonObject[eachKey])])} )) } else { return jsonObject } }

block-definition.translations: pt:a resposta a _ de _ enviando _ e cabeçalhos _

block.l: var response, i, header; if (!proc.httpRequest) { proc.httpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest(); proc.httpRequest.open(method, url, true); proc.assertType(headers, 'list'); for (i = 1; i <= headers.length(); i += 1) { header = headers.at(i); proc.assertType(header, 'list'); proc.httpRequest.setRequestHeader( header.at(1), header.at(2) ); } proc.httpRequest.send(data || null); } else if (proc.httpRequest.readyState === 4) { response = proc.httpRequest.responseText; proc.httpRequest = null; return response; } proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext();

block-definition.comment: Reports a three-item list containing the latitude and longitude of the user, and the precision of the measurements. Works only if the user allows snap.berkeley.edu access to location data. Some browsers also require an HTTPS connection to Snap!.

block.l: if (!proc.geostarted) { var geo = navigator.geolocation; var cords = []; var options = { enableHighAccuracy: false, }; function success(pos) { console.log(pos); proc.geocords = [pos.coords.latitude, pos.coords.longitude, pos.coords.accuracy]; } function error(err) { alert("ERROR " + err.code + ": " + err.message); } proc.geostarted = true; proc.geocords = null; console.log("starting geolocation") geo.getCurrentPosition(success, error, options); } else if (proc.geocords) { var cords = proc.geocords; proc.geostarted = null; proc.geocords = null; console.log("returning"); return new List(cords); } else { console.log("yielding"); proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext(); }

block-definition.comment: draws and labels the axes of a DataSprite

block.l: function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function drawScales() { var dx=(xRight-xLeft)/xIntervals, delta=xTOxp(dx)-x0, xpos=x0; var w,text; while(xpos>=0){xpos=xpos-delta;} while(xpos<0){xpos=xpos+delta;} var x=xpTOx(xpos); ctx.lineWidth = 1; ctx.fillStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.strokeStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.font = ""+textheight+"px sans-serif"; while(xpos<=diagramWidth){ text=x.toPrecision(n); w= ctx.measureText(text).width; ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,diagramHeight-3+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,diagramHeight+upperOffset); ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,1+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,3+upperOffset); if(xpos<diagramWidth-10){ctx.fillText(text,xpos-w/2+leftOffset,diagramHeight+textheight+3+upperOffset);} xpos=xpos+delta; x=xpTOx(xpos); } var dy=(yUpper-yLower)/10, delta=y0-yTOyp(dy), ypos=y0; while(ypos>=0){ypos=ypos-delta;} ypos=ypos+delta; var y=ypTOy(ypos); while(ypos<=diagramHeight){ text=y.toPrecision(n); w= ctx.measureText(text).width; ctx.moveTo(1+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(3+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.moveTo(rightCostumeEdge-3,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(rightCostumeEdge,ypos+upperOffset); if(ypos>10){ctx.fillText(text,leftOffset-25-w/2,ypos+3+upperOffset);} ypos=ypos+delta; y=ypTOy(ypos); } } //variables var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters var xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)), xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)), yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)), yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); var upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)), lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)), leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)), n=Number(scaleattributes.at(1)), textheight=Number(scaleattributes.at(2)),xIntervals=Number(scaleattributes.at(3)); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight,w; var r=backcolor.at(1), g=backcolor.at(2), b=backcolor.at(3); //clear label regions ctx.beginPath(); ctx.fillStyle = new Color(r,g,b).toString(); ctx.strokeStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.lineWidth=1; ctx.fillRect(0,0,rightCostumeEdge,upperOffset-1); ctx.fillRect(0,0,leftOffset-1,lowerCostumeEdge); ctx.fillRect(0,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset+1,rightCostumeEdge,lowerCostumeEdge); ctx.strokeRect(0,0,rightCostumeEdge,lowerCostumeEdge); //draw labels ctx.fillStyle = new Color(0,0,0).toString(); if(upperOffset>0){ ctx.moveTo(0,upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(rightCostumeEdge-1,upperOffset); ctx.font = ""+labels.at(4)+"px sans-serif"; var w= ctx.measureText(labels.at(1)).width; ctx.fillText(labels.at(1),rightCostumeEdge/2-w/2,22); } ctx.moveTo(leftOffset,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset); ctx.lineTo(rightCostumeEdge,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset); if(labels.at(2).length>0){ ctx.font = ""+labels.at(5)+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText(labels.at(2)).width; ctx.fillText(labels.at(2),diagramWidth/2+leftOffset-w/2,lowerCostumeEdge-6); } ctx.moveTo(leftOffset,upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(leftOffset,lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset); if(labels.at(3).length>0){ ctx.font = ""+labels.at(6)+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText(labels.at(3)).width; ctx.rotate(-Math.PI/2); ctx.fillText(labels.at(3),-w/2-lowerCostumeEdge/2,17); ctx.rotate(Math.PI/2); } drawScales(); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke();

block-definition.s: $storage %'n' new data of ranges %'xmin' to %'xmax' and %'ymin' to %'ymax'
block-definition.comment: creates new random data in the specified ranges
draws the data points of a two-dimensional table with numerical values

block.l: function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function round(x,n){return Math.round(x*Math.pow(10,n))/Math.pow(10,n);} function randomInt(min,max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1)+min);} function plotData(){ var i=0,linewidth=lineattributes.at(2),linestyle=1,datawidth=dataattributes.at(2),datastyle=1, connected=dataattributes.at(3); var arraydata=data.asArray(),xpos,ypos,xpOld,ypOld,w; if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='continuous') linestyle = 1; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dashed') linestyle = 2; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dash-dot') linestyle = 3; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dot-dot') linestyle = 4; if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'o circle') datastyle=1; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== '._point') datastyle=2; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()=='*_asterix') datastyle=3; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== '+_plus') datastyle=4; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'x_ex') datastyle=5; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'square') datastyle=6; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'triangle') datastyle=7; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'none') datastyle=8; else datastyle=1; ctx.strokeStyle=new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.fillStyle=new Color(dataattributes.at(4),dataattributes.at(5),dataattributes.at(6)).toString(); ctx.lineWidth = linewidth; if(linestyle==2){ctx.setLineDash([10,5]);} else if(linestyle==3){ctx.setLineDash([10,2,1,2]);} else if(linestyle==4){ctx.setLineDash([1,2]);} else{ctx.setLineDash([]);} if(arraydata.length>0){ xpOld= xTOxp(arraydata[0].at(1)); ypOld=yTOyp(arraydata[0].at(2)); } while(i<arraydata.length){ xpos=xTOxp(arraydata[i].at(1)); ypos=yTOyp(arraydata[i].at(2)); if(connected && i>0){ ctx.beginPath(); ctx.moveTo(xpOld+leftOffset,ypOld+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); } ctx.beginPath(); if(datastyle==1){ ctx.arc(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,datawidth/2,0,6.283185307179586476925286766559); } if(datastyle==2){ ctx.arc(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,2,0,6.283185307179586476925286766559); } if(datastyle==3){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("*").width; ctx.fillText("*",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==4){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("+").width; ctx.fillText("+",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==5){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("X").width; ctx.fillText("X",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==6){ ctx.fillRect(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2,datawidth,datawidth); ctx.strokeRect(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2,datawidth,datawidth); } if(datastyle==7){ ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset+datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==0){ ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset+1); } ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); xpOld=xpos; ypOld=ypos; i=i+1; } ctx.setLineDash([]); } // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)); xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)); yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)); yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)); lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)); leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)); var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight; plotData();

block-definition.comment: calculates the parameters of a regression line

block.l: var meanX,meanY,sumX=0,sumY=0,numerator=0,denominator=0,m,b; i=1; while(i <= data.length()) { sumX=sumX+Number(data.at(i).at(1)); sumY=sumY+Number(data.at(i).at(2)); i++; } meanX=sumX/data.length(); meanY=sumY/data.length(); i=1; while(i <= data.length()) { numerator=numerator+(data.at(i).at(1)-meanX)*(data.at(i).at(2)-meanY); denominator=denominator+(data.at(i).at(1)-meanX)*(data.at(i).at(1)-meanX); i++; } m=numerator/denominator; b=meanY-m*meanX; return new List([m,b]);

block.l: var result=[], i=1, n, value, interval = (max-min)/8; while(i<= data.length()) { value = data.at(i); n = value; if(value<=min) n=min+1; if(value>max) n =max; if(log) n = Math.round(Math.log(n-min)/Math.log(max-min)*255); else n = Math.round((n-min)/(max-min)*255); if(gray) result.push(new List([n,n,n,255])); else { // result.push(new List([n,255-n,Math.round(255-n/2),255])); if(value<=min) {result.push(new List([0,0,0,255]));} else if(value<min+interval) result.push(new List([0,0,n,255])); else if(value<min+2*interval) result.push(new List([0,n,n,255])); else if(value<min+3*interval) result.push(new List([n,0,n,255])); else if(value<min+4*interval) result.push(new List([0,n,0,255])); else if(value<min+5*interval) result.push(new List([n,0,0,n])); else if(value<min+6*interval) result.push(new List([n,n/2,0,255])); else if(value<min+7*interval) result.push(new List([n,n,0,255])); else if(value<min+8*interval) result.push(new List([n,n,n,255])); else result.push(new List([255,255,255,255])); } i = i+1; } return new List(result);

block-definition.comment: calculates the ranges, the covariance or the correlation between two columns of a table

block.l: var xmin,xmax,ymin,ymax,meanx, meany,cov,corr,varx,vary,i,valx,valy; if(table.contents.length<1) return "bad data"; xmin=Number(table.at(1).at(x)); xmax=xmin; ymin=Number(table.at(1).at(y)); ymax=ymin; meanx=xmin; meany=ymin; i=2; while(i<=table.contents.length){ valx=Number(table.at(i).at(x)); valy=Number(table.at(i).at(y)); if(valx<xmin) xmin=valx; if(valx>xmax) xmax=valx; if(valy<ymin) ymin=valy; if(valy>ymax) ymax=valy; meanx=Number(meanx)+valx; meany=Number(meany)+valy; i++; } meanx=meanx/(i-1); meany=meany/(i-1); if(selection=="ranges") return new List([xmin,xmax,ymin,ymax]); i=1; cov=0; corr=0; varx=0; vary=0; while(i<=table.contents.length){ valx=Number(table.at(i).at(x)); valy=Number(table.at(i).at(y)); cov = Number(cov)+(valx-meanx)*(valy-meany); varx = Number(varx) +(valx-meanx)*(valx-meanx); vary = Number(vary) +(valy-meany)*(valy-meany); i++; } varx=Math.sqrt(varx); vary=Math.sqrt(vary); corr = cov/(varx*vary); cov=cov/(i-2); if(selection=="covariance") return cov; if(selection=="correlation") return corr; return "unknown"

block-definition.s: $storage affine transformation of %'imagedata' w %'w' h %'h' by %'originalPoints' --> %'imagePoints'
block-definition.comment: applies an affine transformation to an image

block.l: var x,y,xnew,ynew,value,newdata=[]; for(var i=1;i<=data.contents.length;i++) newdata.push(0); for(var y=1;y<=h;y++) for(var x=1;x<=w;x++){ value= data.at(x+(y-1)*w); xnew=Math.round(a11*x+a12*y+a13); ynew=Math.round(a21*x+a22*y+a23); if((xnew>0) && (xnew<=w) && (ynew>0) && (ynew<=h)) newdata[xnew-1+(ynew-1)*w-1] = value; } return new List(newdata);

block.l: function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function plotHistogram(){ var i=0,linestyle=1, arraydata=data.asArray(), xpos=5, deltaX=(diagramWidth-1)/data.contents.length; ctx.strokeStyle=new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.fillStyle=new Color(lineattributes.at(3),lineattributes.at(4),lineattributes.at(5)).toString(); ctx.lineWidth = lineattributes.at(2); if(deltaX<1) deltaX=1; while(i<arraydata.length){ ypos=yTOyp(arraydata[i].at(2)); ctx.beginPath(); ctx.fillRect(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,deltaX,y0); ctx.strokeRect(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,deltaX,y0); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); i=i+1; xpos=xpos+deltaX } } // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)); xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)); yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)); yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)); upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)); lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)); var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight; plotHistogram();

block-definition.comment: calculates the data for a histogram

block.l: var delta=(max-min)/n, result=new Array(n), h=min+delta/2; for(var i=0;i<n;i++){ result[i]=new List([h,0]); h=h+delta; } for(var i=1;i<=data.length();i++){ h=Math.ceil((data.at(i)-min)/delta); if(h<1) h=1; else if(h>n) h=n; result[h-1]=new List([result[h-1].at(1),Number(result[h-1].at(2))+1]); } return new List(result);

block-definition.comment: draws the graph of a function

block.l: function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function round(x,n){return Math.round(x*Math.pow(10,n))/Math.pow(10,n);} function randomInt(min,max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1)+min);} function myFunction(f,x){ if(f instanceof List){ var grade = f.length(),result; if(grade==0) return 0; else if(grade==1) return Number(f.at(1)); else{ result=Number(f.at(1))*Number(x)+Number(f.at(2)); for(var i=3;i<=grade;i++) result = result*Number(x)+Number(f.at(i)); return result; } } else return proc.reportAtomicMap(f,new List([x])).at(1); //copied from Snap!-code } function plotFunction(f,r,g,b,){ var xpos,ypos,x,y,xpOld,ypOld,plottedDots=0,missingDots=0,style=1, modus = 1; //firstLineattribute=lineattributes.at(1).split(" ")[0]; if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='continuous') style = 1; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dashed') style = 2; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dash-dot') style = 3; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dot-dot') style = 4; ctx.beginPath(); ctx.strokeStyle=new Color(r,g,b).toString(); ctx.fillStyle=new Color(r,g,b).toString(); ctx.lineWidth = lineattributes.at(2); xpOld=0; x=xpTOx(xpOld); y=myFunction(f,x); ypOld=yTOyp(y); xpos=1; while(xpos<=diagramWidth){ x=xpTOx(xpos); y=myFunction(f,x); ypos=yTOyp(y); if(modus>0) { ctx.moveTo(xpOld+leftOffset,ypOld+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); if(style>1) plottedDots++; } else missingDots++; xpOld=xpos; ypOld=ypos; xpos=xpos+1; if(style==2){ if((modus==1) && (plottedDots>3)) {modus = 0; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==0) && (missingDots>2)) {modus = 1; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} } if(style==3){ if((modus==1) && (plottedDots>3)) {modus = 0; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==0) && (missingDots>0)) {modus = 2; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==2) && (plottedDots>0)) {modus = -1; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==-1) && (missingDots>0)) {modus = 1; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} } if(style==4){ if((modus==1) && (plottedDots>0)) {modus = 0; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} else if((modus==0) && (missingDots>0)) {modus = 1; plottedDots=0; missingDots=0;} } } ctx.closePath(); //ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); } // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)); xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)); yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)); yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)); lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)); leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)); var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight; plotFunction(aFunction,Number(lineattributes.at(3)),Number(lineattributes.at(4)),Number(lineattributes.at(5)));

block.l: function imageValue(x,y){ if((x>width)||(x<1)||(y>height)||(y<1)) return 0; else return data.at(x+(y-1)*width); } var sumOfValues=0,points=0,y=ypos-r,x; while((y<=ypos+r) && (y<=height)){ x=xpos-r; while((x<=xpos+r) && (x<=width)){ if(r>Math.sqrt((xpos-x)*(xpos-x)+(ypos-y)*ypos-y)){ sumOfValues=sumOfValues+imageValue(Math.round(x),Math.round(y)); points++; } x++; } y++; } return new List([sumOfValues,points]);

inputs.input: minmin max number sum mean median variance standard-deviation

block.l: var min=10000000,max=-min,sum=0,mean,n=0,isNumber,c; var i=1,k,value; while(i <= aList.length()) { value = aList.at(i); if(typeof(value)=="number") isNumber=true; else{ if(typeof(value)=="string"){ isNumber=true; k=0; while((k<value.length) && isNumber){ c=value.charAt(k); if((c<'0') || (c>'9')) if((c!='E') && (c!='e') && (c!='+') && (c!='-')&& (c!='.') && (c!=',')) isNumber=false; k++; } } else isNumber=false; } if(isNumber){ value=Number(value); if(min>value) min=value; if(max<value) max=value; sum=Number(sum)+Number(value); n++; } i++; } if(n>0) mean=sum/n; else mean=NaN; return new List([min,max,n,sum,mean]);

var n=0,isNumber,c,variance=0; var i=1,k,value; while(i<= aList.contents.length) { value = aList.at(i); if(typeof(value)=="number") isNumber=true; else{ if(typeof(value)=="string"){ isNumber=true; k=0; while((k<value.length) && isNumber){ c=value.charAt(k); if((c<'0') || (c>'9')) if((c!='E') && (c!='e') && (c!='+') && (c!='-')&& (c!='.') && (c!=',')) isNumber=false; k++; } } else isNumber=false; } if(isNumber){ value=Number(value); variance = Number(variance) +(Number(value)-Number(mean))*(Number(value)-Number(mean)); n++; } i++; } if(n>0) variance=variance/n; else variance=NaN; return variance;

block.l: var min,max,sum,mean,n,result,i,value,oldvalue,newvalue,stored=false; function isNumber(val){ var ok,k,c; if(typeof(val)=="number") ok=true; else{ if(typeof(val)=="string"){ ok=true; k=0; while((k<val.length) && ok){ c=val.charAt(k); if((c<'0') || (c>'9')) if((c!='E') && (c!='e') && (c!='+') && (c!='-')&& (c!='.') && (c!=',')) ok=false; k++; } } else ok=false; } return ok; } result=new List(); result.add(new List(['value',operation])); if(aTable.contents.length==0) return result; value = aTable.at(1).at(compaircolumn); if(isNumber(value)){value=Number(value); min=value; max=value; sum=value;} n=1; newvalue = aTable.at(1).at(groupcolumn); if(isNumber(newvalue)) newvalue=Number(newvalue); oldvalue=newvalue; i=2; while(i<=aTable.length()) { stored=false; newvalue=aTable.at(i).at(groupcolumn); if(isNumber(newvalue)) newvalue=Number(newvalue); if(newvalue==oldvalue){ value=aTable.at(i).at(compaircolumn); if(isNumber(value)){if(min>value) min=value; if(max<value) max=value; sum=Number(sum)+Number(value);} n++; } else{ if(operation=='min') result.add(new List([oldvalue,min])); if(operation=='max') result.add(new List([oldvalue,max])); if(operation=='number') result.add(new List([oldvalue,n])); if(operation=='sum') result.add(new List([oldvalue,sum])); if(operation=='mean') result.add(new List([oldvalue,1.0*sum/n])); if(isNumber(value)){value=Number(value); min=value; max=value; sum=value;} n=1; oldvalue=newvalue; stored=true; } i++; } if(!stored){ if(operation=='min') result.add(new List([oldvalue,min])); if(operation=='max') result.add(new List([oldvalue,max])); if(operation=='number') result.add(new List([oldvalue,n])); if(operation=='sum') result.add(new List([oldvalue,sum])); if(operation=='mean') result.add(new List([oldvalue,1.0*sum/n])); } return result;

block-definition.comment: applies a convolution to a table with FITS or RBG values

block.l: function getValue(x,y){ return (data.at(x+(y-1)*width)); } function getKernelValue(x,y){ return (kernel.at(y).at(x)); } var result=[],x,y,value,r,g,b,s; for(var y=1; y<=height;y++) for(var x=1;x<=width;x++){ if(typeOfData=='FITS') value = 0; else if(typeOfData=='RGB'){r=0;g=0;b=0;s=0}; for(var ky=1;ky<=kWidth;ky++) for(var kx=1;kx<=kWidth;kx++) if((y-mIndex+ky>0) && (y-mIndex+ky<=height) && (x-mIndex+kx>0) && (x-mIndex+kx<=width)){ if(typeOfData=='FITS') value = value+getValue(x-mIndex+kx,y-mIndex+ky)*getKernelValue(kx,ky); else if(typeOfData=='RGB'){ r = r + getValue(x-mIndex+kx,y-mIndex+ky).at(1)*getKernelValue(kx,ky); g = g + getValue(x-mIndex+kx,y-mIndex+ky).at(2)*getKernelValue(kx,ky); b = b + getValue(x-mIndex+kx,y-mIndex+ky).at(3)*getKernelValue(kx,ky); s = s + getValue(x-mIndex+kx,y-mIndex+ky).at(4)*getKernelValue(kx,ky); } } if(typeOfData=='FITS') result.push(value); else if(typeOfData=='RGB') result.push(new List([r,g,b,s])); } return new List(result);

block-definition.s: $storage compress data %'data' with factor %'n' by averaging
block-definition.comment: reduces the data volume of a table by averaging

block.l: function mean(d,n){ var sum=0; for(var i=1;i<=d.length();i++){ sum=sum+Number(d.at(i).at(n)); } return sum/d.length(); } function mean2(d){ var sum=0; for(var i=1;i<=d.length();i++){ sum=sum+Number(d.at(i)); } return sum/d.length(); } var result=new List(),i,j,h1,h2; n=Math.round(n); if(data.at(1) instanceof List){ i=1; while(i<=data.length()-n+1){ h1 = new List(); h1.add(data.at(i)); j=1; while(j<=n-1){ h1.add(data.at(i+j)); j++; } j=1; h2=new List(); while(j<=h1.at(1).length()){ h2.add(mean(h1,j)); j++; } result.add(h2); i=i+n; } } else{ i=1; while(i<=data.length()-n+1){ h1 = new List(); h1.add(data.at(i)); j=1; while(j<=n-1){ h1.add(data.at(i+j)); j++; } result.add(mean2(h1)); i=i+n; } } return result;

block.l: function toCSV(data){ var items=data.itemsArray(),rows = []; function encodeCell(atomicValue) { var string = atomicValue.toString(),cell; if (string.indexOf('\"') === -1 && (string.indexOf('\n') === -1) && (string.indexOf('\,') === -1)) { return string; } cell = ['\"']; string.split('').forEach(function (letter) {cell.push(letter); if (letter === '\"') {cell.push(letter);} }); cell.push('\"'); return cell.join(''); } if (items.some(function (any) {return any instanceof List; })) { items.forEach(function (item) { if (item instanceof List) { rows.push(item.itemsArray().map(encodeCell).join(',')); } else {rows.push(encodeCell(item));} }); return rows.join('\n'); } return items.map(encodeCell).join(','); } var ide = this.parent.parent; ide.saveFileAs(toCSV(data),'text/csv;charset=utf-8',filename);

block.l: var result=[], i=1, n, value, interval = (max-min)/8; while(i<= data.length()) { value = (data.at(i).at(1)+data.at(i).at(2)+data.at(i).at(3))/3; n = value; if(value<=min) n=min+1; if(value>max) n =max; if(log) n = Math.round(Math.log(n-min)/Math.log(max-min)*255); else n = Math.round((n-min)/(max-min)*255); if(gray) result.push(new List([n,n,n,255])); else { // result.push(new List([n,255-n,Math.round(255-n/2),255])); if(value<=min) {result.push(new List([0,0,0,255]));} else if(value<min+interval) result.push(new List([0,0,n,255])); else if(value<min+2*interval) result.push(new List([0,n,n,255])); else if(value<min+3*interval) result.push(new List([n,0,n,255])); else if(value<min+4*interval) result.push(new List([0,n,0,255])); else if(value<min+5*interval) result.push(new List([n,0,0,n])); else if(value<min+6*interval) result.push(new List([n,n/2,0,255])); else if(value<min+7*interval) result.push(new List([n,n,0,255])); else if(value<min+8*interval) result.push(new List([n,n,n,255])); else result.push(new List([255,255,255,255])); } i = i+1; } return new List(result);

switch (which) { case 'Presentation mode': if (tf != ide.isAppMode) ide.toggleAppMode(); break; case 'Retina display support': if (tf != isRetinaEnabled()) ide.toggleRetina(); break; case 'Long form input dialog': if (tf != InputSlotDialogMorph.prototype.isLaunchingExpanded) ide.toggleLongFormInputDialog(); break; case 'Plain prototype labels': if (tf != BlockLabelPlaceHolderMorph.prototype.plainLabel) ide.togglePlainPrototypeLabels(); break; case 'Input sliders': MorphicPreferences.useSliderForInput = tf; break; case 'Execute on slider change': ArgMorph.prototype.executeOnSliderEdit = tf; break; case 'Clicking sound': if (tf != !!BlockMorph.prototype.snapSound) BlockMorph.prototype.toggleSnapSound(); break; case 'Turbo mode': if (tf != stage.isFastTracked) ide.toggleFastTracking(); break; case 'Flat design': if (tf == MorphicPreferences.isFlat) break; if (tf) ide.flatDesign(); else ide.defaultDesign(); break; case 'Keyboard editing': if (tf != (world.keyboardReceiver instanceof ScriptFocusMorph)) { thisObj.scripts.toggleKeyboardEntry(); }; break; case 'Visible stepping': if (tf != Process.prototype.enableSingleStepping) ide.toggleSingleStepping(); break; case 'Thread safe scripts': stage.isThreadSafe = tf; break; case 'Prefer smooth animations': if (tf != (StageMorph.prototype.frameRate > 0)) ide.toggleVariableFrameRate(); break; case 'Flat line ends': SpriteMorph.prototype.useFlatLineEnds = tf; break; case 'Codification support': if (tf != StageMorph.prototype.enableCodeMapping) { StageMorph.prototype.enableCodeMapping = tf; ide.currentSprite.blocksCache.variables = null; ide.currentSprite.paletteCache.variables = null; ide.refreshPalette(); } break; case 'Inheritance support': if (tf != StageMorph.prototype.enableInheritance) { StageMorph.prototype.enableInheritance = tf; ide.currentSprite.blocksCache.variables = null; ide.currentSprite.paletteCache.variables = null; ide.refreshPalette(); } break; }; } finally { ide.savingPreferences = false; };

var result=new List(),rowsA=a.length(),rowsB=b.length(),colsA=a.at(1).length(); var colsB=b.at(1).length(),row,sum; if(op=="+"){ if((rowsA==rowsB) && (colsA==colsB)){ for(var i=1;i<=rowsA;i++){ row=new List(); for(j=1;j<=colsA;j++) row.add(Number(a.at(i).at(j))+Number(b.at(i).at(j))); result.add(row); } return result; } else return "ERROR: different dimensions"; } if(op=="-"){ if((rowsA==rowsB) && (colsA==colsB)){ for(var i=1;i<=rowsA;i++){ row=new List(); for(j=1;j<=colsA;j++) row.add(Number(a.at(i).at(j))-Number(b.at(i).at(j))); result.add(row); } return result; } else return "ERROR: different dimensions"; } if(op=="*"){ if(colsA==rowsB){ for(var i=1;i<=rowsA;i++){ row=new List(); for(j=1;j<=colsB;j++){ sum=0; for(k=1;k<=colsA;k++) sum=sum+(Number(a.at(i).at(k))*Number(b.at(k).at(j))); row.add(sum); } result.add(row); } return result; } else return "ERROR: wrong dimensions"; } return "ERROR: wrong operation";

block.l: function strToInt(high,low){ var left = high.toString(2), right = low.toString(2); while(left.length<8) left="0"+left; while(right.length<8) right="0"+right; var both = left+right, result = 0; var factor = 1; for(var i=15; i>=0;i--) { if(both.charAt(i)=='1') result = result+factor; factor = factor*2; } return result; } var width=0, height=0, numberlength=0; minValue=32768, maxValue=-32769,header=[], pixelvalues=[], keyword='', kwvalue='', indexInLine=0, i=0, insideString=false, finished=false, c=' ', n=0, mask = Math.pow(2,7)-1; i=0; while((i<2880) && (i<FITSdata.length)){ indexInLine=1; keyword=''; c = FITSdata.charAt(i); while((c!=' ') && (c!='=') && (i<2880) && (i<FITSdata.length) && (indexInLine<=80)){ keyword = keyword+c; i++; indexInLine++; c = FITSdata.charAt(i); } while(((c==' ') || (c=='=')) && (i<2880) && (i<FITSdata.length) && (indexInLine<=80)){ i++; indexInLine++; c = FITSdata.charAt(i); } kwvalue=''; insideString=false; finished=false; while(!finished){ kwvalue=kwvalue+FITSdata.charAt(i); if(c=="'") insideString = !insideString; i++; indexInLine++; c = FITSdata.charAt(i); if(insideString) finished=(i>=2880) || (i>=FITSdata.length) || (indexInLine>80); else finished= (c==' ') || (i>=2880) || (i>=FITSdata.length) || (indexInLine>80); } if(keyword.length>0) header.push(new List([keyword,kwvalue])); if(keyword=='NAXIS1') width=kwvalue; if(keyword=='NAXIS2') height=kwvalue; if(keyword=='BITPIX') numberlength=kwvalue; while((i<2880) && (i<FITSdata.length) && (indexInLine<=80)){ i++; indexInLine++; } } if(numberlength==16){ i=2880; while(i<FITSdata.length-1){ n = strToInt(FITSdata.charAt(i).charCodeAt(0),FITSdata.charAt(i+1).charCodeAt(0)); //n = -(n & mask) + (n & ~mask); pixelvalues.push(n); if(n>maxValue) maxValue=n; if(n<minValue) minValue=n; i = i+2; } return new List([width,height,minValue,maxValue,new List(header),new List(pixelvalues)]); } else return 'unsupported number format';

solves a linear equation, if possible

block.l: var m=new List(), result, solved=true, width; //code "solve" copied from Walter Bislins: http://walter.bislins.ch/blog/index.asp?page=L%F6sen+linearer+Gleichungssysteme+%28JavaScript%29 function solve( m ) { function findNotZeroRow( r ) { for ( var nzr = r + 1; nzr < d; nzr++ ) { if ( m[nzr][r] != 0 ) return nzr; } return -1; } function swapRows( r1, r2 ) { for ( var c = 0; c <= d; c++ ) { var tmp = m[r1][c]; m[r1][c] = m[r2][c]; m[r2][c] = tmp; } } function normRow( r ) { // require m[r][r] != 0 var a = m[r][r]; if ( a == 1 ) return; m[r][r] = 1; for ( var c = r + 1; c <= d; c++ ) { m[r][c] /= a; } } function zeroCell( zr, zc ) { var a = m[zr][zc]; if ( a == 0 ) return; m[zr][zc] = 0; for ( var c = zc + 1; c <= d; c++ ) { m[zr][c] -= a * m[zc][c]; } } var d = m.length; for ( var r = 0; r < d; r++ ) { if ( m[r][r] == 0 ) { var nzr = findNotZeroRow( r ); if ( nzr == -1 ) return false; swapRows( r, nzr ); } // assert m[r][r] != 0 normRow( r ); for ( var zr = 0; zr < d; zr++ ) { if ( zr != r ) { zeroCell( zr, r ); } } } return true; } for(var i=1;i<=matrix.length();i++) m.add(matrix.at(i).asArray()); m = m.asArray(); solved=solve(m); if(solved){ result = new List(); width = m[0].length-1; for(var i=0;i<m.length;i++) result.add(m[i][width]); return result; } else return "ERROR: equation not solved";

block-definition.comment: creates the interpolation polynom for a list of points

block.l: //with help from code based on Walter Bislins: http://walter.bislins.ch/blog/index.asp?page=L%F6sen+linearer+Gleichungssysteme+%28JavaScript%29 function solve( m ) { function findNotZeroRow( r ) { for ( var nzr = r + 1; nzr < d; nzr++ ) { if ( m[nzr][r] != 0 ) return nzr; } return -1; } function swapRows( r1, r2 ) { for ( var c = 0; c <= d; c++ ) { var tmp = m[r1][c]; m[r1][c] = m[r2][c]; m[r2][c] = tmp; } } function normRow( r ) { // require m[r][r] != 0 var a = m[r][r]; if ( a == 1 ) return; m[r][r] = 1; for ( var c = r + 1; c <= d; c++ ) { m[r][c] /= a; } } function zeroCell( zr, zc ) { var a = m[zr][zc]; if ( a == 0 ) return; m[zr][zc] = 0; for ( var c = zc + 1; c <= d; c++ ) { m[zr][c] -= a * m[zc][c]; } } var d = m.length; for ( var r = 0; r < d; r++ ) { if ( m[r][r] == 0 ) { var nzr = findNotZeroRow( r ); if ( nzr == -1 ) return false; swapRows( r, nzr ); } // assert m[r][r] != 0 normRow( r ); for ( var zr = 0; zr < d; zr++ ) { if ( zr != r ) { zeroCell( zr, r ); } } } return true; } var matrix = [], n=xValues.length(),x,row,result, solved=true, width; for(var i=1;i<=n;i++){ row = []; for(var j=n-1;j>=0;j--){ x=1; for(var k=j;k>0;k--) x = x*Number(xValues.at(i)); row.push(x); } row.push(yValues.at(i)); matrix.push(row); } solved=solve(matrix); if(solved){ result = new List(); width = matrix[0].length-1; for(var i=0;i<matrix.length;i++) result.add(matrix[i][width]); return result; } else return "ERROR: no solution found";

block-definition.comment: calculates the value of a polynom for input x

block.l: //calculation by Horner-schema var grade = poly.length(),result; if(grade==0) return 0; else if(grade==1) return Number(poly.at(1)); else{ result=Number(poly.at(1))*Number(x)+Number(poly.at(2)); for(var i=3;i<=grade;i++) result = result*Number(x)+Number(poly.at(i)); return result; }

block.l: function imageValue(x,y){ if((x>width)||(x<1)||(y>height)||(y<1)) return 0; else return data.at(x+(y-1)*width); } var sumOfValues=0,points=0,y=ypos-r,x; while((y<=ypos+r) && (y<=height)){ x=xpos-r; while((x<=xpos+r) && (x<=width)){ if(r>Math.sqrt((xpos-x)*(xpos-x)+(ypos-y)*ypos-y)){ sumOfValues=sumOfValues+imageValue(Math.round(x),Math.round(y)); points++; } x++; } y++; } return sumOfValues;

function xTOxp(x){return x0+(x*diagramWidth/(xRight-xLeft));} function yTOyp(y){return y0-(y*diagramHeight/(yUpper-yLower));} function xpTOx(xp){return (xp-x0)*(xRight-xLeft)/diagramWidth;} function ypTOy(yp){return (y0-yp)*(yUpper-yLower)/diagramHeight;} function round(x,n){return Math.round(x*Math.pow(10,n))/Math.pow(10,n);} function randomInt(min,max){return Math.floor(Math.random()*(max-min+1)+min);} function plotData(){ var i=0,linewidth=lineattributes.at(2),linestyle=1,datawidth=dataattributes.at(2),datastyle=1, connected=dataattributes.at(3),dx,x; var arraydata=data.asArray(),xpos,ypos,xpOld,ypOld,w; if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='continuous') linestyle = 1; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dashed') linestyle = 2; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dash-dot') linestyle = 3; else if(lineattributes.at(1).trim()=='dot-dot') linestyle = 4; if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'o circle') datastyle=1; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== '._point') datastyle=2; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()=='*_asterix') datastyle=3; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== '+_plus') datastyle=4; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'x_ex') datastyle=5; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'square') datastyle=6; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'triangle') datastyle=7; else if(dataattributes.at(1).trim()== 'none') datastyle=8; else datastyle=1; ctx.strokeStyle=new Color(0,0,0).toString(); ctx.fillStyle=new Color(dataattributes.at(4),dataattributes.at(5),dataattributes.at(6)).toString(); ctx.lineWidth = linewidth; if(linestyle==2){ctx.setLineDash([10,5]);} else if(linestyle==3){ctx.setLineDash([10,2,1,2]);} else if(linestyle==4){ctx.setLineDash([1,2]);} else{ctx.setLineDash([]);} if(arraydata.length>0){ dx=(xRight-xLeft)/arraydata.length; x=xLeft; xpOld= xTOxp(x); ypOld=yTOyp(arraydata[0].at(2)); } while(i<arraydata.length){ xpos=xTOxp(x); ypos=yTOyp(arraydata[i].at(2)); if(connected && i>0){ ctx.beginPath(); ctx.moveTo(xpOld+leftOffset,ypOld+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); } ctx.beginPath(); if(datastyle==1){ ctx.arc(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,datawidth/2,0,6.283185307179586476925286766559); } if(datastyle==2){ ctx.arc(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset,2,0,6.283185307179586476925286766559); } if(datastyle==3){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("*").width; ctx.fillText("*",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==4){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("+").width; ctx.fillText("+",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==5){ ctx.font = ""+datawidth+"px sans-serif"; w= ctx.measureText("X").width; ctx.fillText("X",xpos+leftOffset-w/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==6){ ctx.fillRect(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2,datawidth,datawidth); ctx.strokeRect(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2,datawidth,datawidth); } if(datastyle==7){ ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset-datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset+datawidth/2,ypos+upperOffset+datawidth/2); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset-datawidth/2); } if(datastyle==0){ ctx.moveTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset); ctx.lineTo(xpos+leftOffset,ypos+upperOffset+1); } ctx.closePath(); ctx.fill(); ctx.stroke(); xpOld=xpos; ypOld=ypos; i=i+1; x=x+dx; } ctx.setLineDash([]); } // to ensure the correct type "Number" to number parameters xLeft = Number(ranges.at(1)); xRight = Number(ranges.at(2)); yLower = Number(ranges.at(3)); yUpper = Number(ranges.at(4)); upperOffset = Number(offsets.at(2)); lowerOffset = Number(offsets.at(3)); leftOffset = Number(offsets.at(1)); var ctx = costume.contents.getContext('2d'); var rightCostumeEdge=costume.contents.width, lowerCostumeEdge=costume.contents.height, diagramWidth=rightCostumeEdge-leftOffset, diagramHeight=lowerCostumeEdge-lowerOffset-upperOffset; var x0=xLeft/(xLeft-xRight)*diagramWidth, y0=yUpper/(yUpper-yLower)*diagramHeight; plotData();

variable.name: asebacode
variable.l: ##! Basic Thymio Motion AESL ##! David J Sherman - david.sherman@inria.fr ##! Nathalie Carrie - IREM de la Réunion ##! Arnaud Verhille - gist974arobasegmailpointcom ##! This AESL program defines high-level behaviors for the Thymio-II robot that enable ##! it to cooperate with programs like Snap! using Nodejs and thymioHTTP REST API var motorbusy var i var r var g var b motorbusy = 0 i = 0 mic.threshold = 12 motor.left.target=0 motor.right.target=0 call sound.system(3) ##! MOTOR THYMIO EVENTS onevent M_motor_both motor.left.target=event.args[0] motor.right.target=event.args[1] onevent M_motor_timed motor.left.target=event.args[0] motor.right.target=event.args[1] timer.period[0] = event.args[2] motorbusy = 1 onevent timer0 motor.left.target=0 motor.right.target=0 motorbusy = 0 timer.period[0] = 0 ##! LED THYMIO EVENTS onevent V_leds_prox_h call leds.prox.h(event.args[0],event.args[1],event.args[2],event.args[3],event.args[4],event.args[5],event.args[6],event.args[7]) onevent V_leds_circle call leds.circle(event.args[0],event.args[1],event.args[2],event.args[3],event.args[4],event.args[5],event.args[6],event.args[7]) onevent V_leds_top call leds.top(event.args[0],event.args[1],event.args[2]) onevent V_leds_bottom_left call leds.bottom.left(event.args[0],event.args[1],event.args[2]) onevent V_leds_bottom_right call leds.bottom.right(event.args[0],event.args[1],event.args[2]) onevent V_leds_prox_v call leds.prox.v(event.args[0],event.args[1]) onevent V_leds_buttons call leds.buttons(event.args[0],event.args[1],event.args[2],event.args[3]) onevent V_leds_rc call leds.rc(event.args[0]) onevent V_leds_temperature call leds.temperature(event.args[0],event.args[1]) onevent V_leds_sound call leds.sound(event.args[0]) ##! SOUND THYMIO EVENTS onevent A_sound_system call sound.system(event.args[0]) onevent A_sound_play call sound.play(event.args[0]) onevent A_sound_replay call sound.replay(event.args[0]) onevent A_sound_record call sound.record(event.args[0]) onevent A_sound_freq call sound.freq(event.args[0],event.args[1]) onevent ping call math.rand(r) r = abs r r = r % 20 call math.rand(g) g = abs g g = g % 20 call math.rand(b) b = abs b b = b % 20 call leds.top(r,g,b)
